observation: I can see the Specter.AI homepage with a Sign Up button in the header and two prominent buttons below - 'Create Account' and 'Get Started'. I can also see form elements (email and password inputs) further down the page, but I need to scroll to access them. The Create Account button appears to be the main signup entry point.
reasoning: As a normal user wanting to sign up, I should click the 'Create Account' button which appears to be the primary signup action on this page. This will likely take me to the registration form or process.
ux_issues: The signup form elements are positioned very far down the page, making them not immediately visible

outcome.visual_observation: The sign-up flow has progressed. The BEFORE screenshot shows a page with dashed outline boxes and numbered elements (8, 10), while the AFTER screenshot shows a loading state with a red circular loading indicator/spinner in the center of the page, indicating the account creation process is in progress.
